name: Full-Stack Application with Incubating FlowUI
description:
Jmix web application in Java that uses Vaadin Flow framework for UI.

Contains FlowUI, Security, File Storage subsystems and Data Tools add-on.
Uses embedded HSQL database.

CAUTION:The FlowUI subsystem is currently in incubating state. It is not sufficiently tested yet and does not contain all features of the previous UI.
